collaboration.subtitle: Personal Trainer ¬∑ Competitor ¬∑ Content Creator
collaboration.aboutDesc: I'm a certified personal trainer specializing in strength training and bikini competition prep with 3 years of experience. As a trainer and competitor myself, I create authentic content documenting real fitness journeys, training techniques, and lifestyle transformations.
collaboration.specializationDesc: Strength training ¬∑ Competition prep ¬∑ Body transformation ¬∑ Sports nutrition
collaboration.credentialsDesc: Certified Personal Trainer ¬∑ Bikini Competitor ¬∑ 3+ Years Experience
collaboration.valueProp1Desc: Certified Personal Trainer with 3+ years of experience and competition background
collaboration.valueProp2Desc: Engaged fitness community, perfect for wellness brands
collaboration.valueProp3Desc: Real training documentation, not just product placement
collaboration.valueProp5Desc: Instagram and TikTok for comprehensive exposure
collaboration.valueProp6Desc: Experience with Yeoreo, Flourish, Squeeze Me Skinny, Legion Athletics
collaboration.yeoreoDesc: Showcasing activewear collection through training content and lifestyle posts.
collaboration.flourishDesc: Promoting wellness products integrated into daily fitness routine.
collaboration.squeezeDesc: Featuring body shaping products in training and lifestyle content.
